entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this morning. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 22 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 16 except minus 22 in low lying areas.

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Flurries beginning in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 27 January 2023
